meanings: get possessed by a demon, be caught by an evil spirit, be jinxed [hoodooed], be thwarted by evil influence.
(관용)be possessed by an evil spirit[a demon],be bewitched[bedeviled],be tempted by a devil,come under the influence of an evil spirit,be jinxed
